planet.name: KOI 1831 b
planet.description: This is a Kepler Object of Interest. It has been flagged as a possible transit event but might have not been confirmed to be a planet yet.

planet.description: This is a Kepler Object of Interest. It has been flagged as a possible transit event but might have not been confirmed to be a planet yet.
